meanings.definition: The form or process of civil government and administration.
meanings.sent1: In some polities, leaders are chosen through fair elections.
meanings.sent2: The history books are filled with stories of ancient polities.
meanings.sent3: The polities in the story all had different rules for their citizens.
meanings.sent4: The growth of technology has changed the landscape of modern polities.
meanings.sent5: Studying different polities helps us understand how societies function.

meanings.definition: The political organization of a state.
meanings.sent1: The polities in this region have unique ways of governing.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the polities of different countries is important for diplomacy.
meanings.sent3: The polities of the neighboring states often clashed over resources.
meanings.sent4: The stability of a nation depends on the strength of its polities.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of polities around the world is fascinating to explore.
